body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.1.11.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#202](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/202) UI: Missing "loading" meter at top of page
* [#201](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/201) Added support for Open Shift v3
* [#197](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/197) Back-End: Option to disable trust manager when invoking KC endpoints
* [#194](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/194) Support for Bitbucket
* [#192](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/192) Under Java 9, mvn install fails in javadoc build with : "Cannot find symbol: javax.annotation.PostConstruct"
* [#189](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/189) Adding support for GitLab
* [#188](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/188) API Editor: adjust width of Set License dialog
* [#187](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/187) API Editor: Problems with $ref for types
* [#185](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/185) API Editor: disable auto-completion for some inputs
* [#184](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/184) API Editor: no minimum width for Version inline editor
* [#182](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/182) Now extracting Tags from OAI content to display (and filter) in UI
* [#162](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/162) Linked Account: Bitbucket
* [#161](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/161) Linked Account: GitLab
* [#156](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/156) Add Apicurio Studio to the OAI 3.0 impls list
* [#152](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/152) API Listing: Show a progress UI of some kind when deleting APIs
* [#148](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/148) API Editor: Invalidate "add/clone" form for duplicate values
* [#131](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/131) API Editor: When saving changes the current selection is de-selected
* [#130](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/130) API Editor: support required/optional for Schema properties
* [#122](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/122) API Editor: Support 'required' for parameters
* [#111](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/111) API Editor: it is often tricky to click on a dropdown item
* [#55](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/55) API Listing+API Details:  Support tags


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 12
